directions: Heat oil in a saucepan over low heat. Add onion and garlic. Cook and stir until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add passata, basil, and salt. Cover and simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tomato sauce has thickened, about 20 minutes. Remove garlic halves before serving.
ingredients: ¼ cup fresh basil, torn in half
title: Sugo di Pomodoro (Authentic Italian Tomato Sauce)
